name: Fluid
author: Fluid.us, Paul Bearne

sections.description:
Expand Your Monetization Reach

Capture revenues beyond advertising and traditional paywalls. Fluid is a new revenue partner for publishers. Fluid enables you to create new direct revenues from your readers and audience.

With Fluid readers can pay to access a single article, video and more. You decide. Fluid is completely turnkey.

Existing Fluid users (i.e., consumers) can pay to access content on your website with just a couple clicks. Simple, frictionless.

Publisher Features

  • Set your price-per-article (or single piece of content)
  • Enable Fluid Gateway across your entire website or only when an ad-blocker is detected

Join Our Exclusive Launch Partner Program

Gain early access, get preferred terms, white glove service and more. We are inviting a few select partners to participate in our exclusive Launch Partner Program. For more information and to sign-up go to Fluid Launch partner Program.

Set-Up Costs

Free for publishers. No cost to you, we will cut you the checks.

Why Fluid?

Current paywalls and subscriptions don’t (necessarily) scale for the majority of publishers. However, publishers need a pathway to monetize consumers directly. In fact, when we surveyed consumers most are willing to pay something to access a single piece of content if given the means.

Learn More About Fluid

https://www.fluid.us/publishers

sections.faq:
What is Fluid?

Simply said, Fluid is a simple to use micropayments platform. Fluid believes there is a better way to support the content we all love. Fluid is creating a new content consumption experience for consumers that is seamless and intuitive, while introducing new paths to monetization for publishers.

How do I get paid using Fluid?

https://www.fluid.us/publishers.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
  4. Link your site to you Fluid.us
